title: Data downloads
text: Study data — The datasets below are from the SwarmGenomics paper and are provided for download and for repeating selected sub‑analyses.

title: SwarmGenomics
text:
A unified pipeline and data portal for individual-based whole‑genome analyses.


Browse Data Teaching Slides GitHub Repo bioRxiv PDF

title: SwarmGenomics
text:
About
SwarmGenomics is a modular pipeline for reference‑based genome assembly and individual‑based genetic analyses (e.g. heterozygosity, runs of homozygosity, PSMC, repeat analysis, mitogenome assembly, NUMTs). This site is the course & data portal: access study data, teaching materials, and links to reproducible workflows.

title: SwarmGenomics
text:
What you can do here

Data — download study datasets and repeat selected sub‑analyses.
Teaching Slides — lecture/practical decks for running SwarmGenomics as a course.
GitHub — scripts and documentation.

title: SwarmGenomics
text:
Further reading

Preprint on bioRxiv: SwarmGenomics preprint.
